issue.title: [R] rename_with s3 method for arrow_dplyr_query
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15947](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15947). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Created a simple version of `rename_with` that applies the function to the current names of the .data argument and passes the result to `rename`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15947?focusedCommentId=17513680) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12642
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12642>
